sourcesContent:
export const lightTheme = {
  background: '#FFFFFF',
  text: '#333333',
  primary: '#6C63FF',
  secondary: '#FF6584',
  accent: '#43D9AD',
  card: '#F8F9FA',
  border: '#E9ECEF',
  shadow: '0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)',
  navBackground: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)',
  footerBackground: '#F8F9FA',
  success: '#28a745',
  error: '#dc3545',
  warning: '#ffc107',
  info: '#17a2b8',
};

export const darkTheme = {
  background: '#121212',
  text: '#F8F9FA',
  primary: '#BB86FC',
  secondary: '#03DAC6',
  accent: '#CF6679',
  card: '#1E1E1E',
  border: '#333333',
  shadow: '0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)',
  navBackground: 'rgba(18, 18, 18, 0.8)',
  footerBackground: '#1E1E1E',
  success: '#28a745',
  error: '#dc3545',
  warning: '#ffc107',
  info: '#17a2b8',
};
